code: import React from'react';import{calculateLapsAroundEarth,calculateDistanceToMoon}from'../utils/calculations';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Infographic=_ref=>{let{mileage}=_ref;const laps=calculateLapsAroundEarth(mileage);const distanceToMoon=calculateDistanceToMoon(mileage);const remainingLaps=laps<1?1-laps:0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"infographic",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Infographic"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mileage-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total Mileage: ",mileage," km"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Laps Around Earth: ",laps.toFixed(2)]}),remainingLaps>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Remaining Laps to Complete One: ",remainingLaps.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Distance to Moon: ",distanceToMoon.toFixed(2)," km"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"visualization",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/kms/images/earth.svg",alt:"Earth",className:"earth-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/kms/images/moon.svg",alt:"Moon",className:"moon-image"})]})]});};export default Infographic;
